patterns: Tell me more about this organization
What is the objective of this organization?
responses: Our objective is to provide a complete website for animal veterinary consultations that will not only make it easier to   schedule pet vaccinations but also connect local organizations who support street animal care with scheduling opportunities. Our goal with this platform is to give pet owners easy access to veterinarian care while simultaneously encouraging community involvement and support for the care of stray animals.

Our goal is to provide a one stop solution for animal veterinary consultations that will not only make it easier to schedule pet vaccinations but also connect local organizations who support street animal care with scheduling opportunities. Our goal with this platform is to give pet owners easy access to veterinarian care while simultaneously encouraging community involvement and support for the care of stray animals.
